Banner Section with Call-to-Action.Layout: Single-row layout with a text message, a call-to-action button, and a close button.
Banner Section with Call-to-Action.Design: Compact and attention-grabbing, featuring a central text block with supportive elements for action and dismissal.

Key Elements.Text Message: Centered or left-aligned, providing essential information or a brief announcement.
Key Elements.Call-to-Action Button: Prominently displayed next to the text message, encouraging users to take immediate action (e.g., 'Learn more').
Key Elements.Close Button: Positioned to the right, allowing users to dismiss the banner easily.

Banner Section with Call-to-Action.Use Cases: Ideal for notifications, announcements, promotions, or urgent messages that need to capture the user's attention quickly.
